Key Match Events: India scored 184-6 in 20 overs with Virat Kohli scoring 64* (44) and KL Rahul scoring 50 (32).
Bangladesh's target was revised to 151 off 16 overs due to rain.
Post-Match Reflections: India captain Rohit Sharma expressed his calmness and nervousness during the match.
Bangladesh captain Shakib Al Hasan acknowledged the close match and the crowd's enjoyment.
Virat Kohli shared his happiness about playing in Australia and the crowd's support.
Miscellaneous Highlights: India moved to the top of Group 2 and will reach the semi-finals if they beat Zimbabwe in their final game.
Bangladesh need to beat Pakistan and hope for other results to go their way to advance.
Others: The match was a thriller with Bangladesh coming very close to a memorable win.
The match report from Netherlands' win over Zimbabwe is available.
A World Cup permutations piece is also live and being updated.
